text:
"Maaf, [redacted_name]. Aku membuatmu repot lagi."
"Tidak apa-apa."
"Apa yang Phi pernah bilang apa padamu?"
"Kalau tersesat, duduk diam dan tunggu. [redacted_name] yang akan mencarimu," kataku mengulang apa yang pernah [redacted_name] bilang. Karena, jika aku mencoba mencari jalan sendiri, aku hanya akan semakin tersesat. Jadi kami sepakat, [redacted_name] yang akan menemukanku, dan aku harus menjadi anak baik dengan menunggu.
"Benar, Typhoon tidak mau tersesat, kan?"
"Tidak."
"Kalau Typhoon tidak membantu, anak kucing ini mungkin kesulitan."
"Iya, dia gemetaran sekali."
"Biar Phi lihat." [redacted_name] mengambil anak kucing itu dariku, lalu melepaskan jaketnya dan membalut anak kucing itu. "Hari ini, biar anak kucing ini pakai jaket Phi dulu ya."
Aku mengangguk. Biasanya [redacted_name] selalu memakai jaket saat datang mencariku. Katanya, jaket itu sengaja dibawa untukku.
"[redacted_name]..."
"Ya?"
"Bolehkah aku merawatnya?"
"Eh... Phi pikir, bagaimana kalau kita cari orang lain yang bisa merawatnya?"
"Aku ingin merawatnya."
"Dia pasti kesepian seperti aku. Kalau kita bersama, dia tidak akan kesepian."
trans:
"I'm sorry, [redacted_name]. I keep bothering you."
"It's okay."
"What did Phi ever tell you?"
"If you're lost, sit still and wait. [redacted_name] will come find you," I said, repeating what [redacted_name] had told me. Because if I tried to find my own way, I’d only get more lost. So we agreed that [redacted_name] would find me, and I had to be a good child and wait.
"Right, Typhoon doesn’t want to get lost, does he?"
"No."
"If Typhoon doesn’t help, this little kitten might have a hard time."
"Yeah, it’s really shivering."
"Let Phi take a look." [redacted_name] took the kitten from me, removed their jacket, and wrapped the kitten in it. "For today, let this kitten wear Phi's jacket, okay?"
I nodded. Usually, [redacted_name] always wore a jacket when they came to find me. They said the jacket was specifically brought for me.
"[redacted_name]..."
"Yes?"
"Can I take care of it?"
"Uh… Phi thinks, how about we find someone else who can take care of it?"
"I want to take care of it."
"It must be as lonely as I am. If we’re together, it won’t be lonely."
